node.html: Developed a user-friendly web application for solar plant installation provider, conducted a comparative analysis of ML algorithms to determine that SVR had the highest solar energy prediction accuracy of 95% in Mumbai.
Developer a scalable web application that allows users to search for restaurants based on location, cuisine and ratings
A nicer look at your GitHub profile and repo stats. Includes data visualizations of your top languages, starred repositories, and sort through your top repos by number of stars, forks, and size.

frontmatter.title: Apple Music Embeddable Web Player Widget

node.html: Embeddable web player widget for Apple Music that lets users log in and listen to full song playback in the browser leveraging MusicKit.js. Read more about this project on 9to5Mac.
Facebook Messenger chat bot extension featuring authentication and full song streaming from within the Messenger app. Read more about it on The Verge.
Third iteration of my personal website built with Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages.
Second iteration of my personal website. Designed and developed with a conscious effort to avoid using any superfluous frameworks like Bootstrap.

Starry Station android app feature that provided users with the ability to easily filter content, pause the internet, and even create custom rules for blocking apps like Facebook and Twitter right from their phones.
Online version of my 2016 resume made for fun. I was interested in learning React.js, so I found a simple tutorial and it spun into a weekend project.
My first portfolio website I designed and built in 2014. I learned quite a bit about HTML, CSS, and SEO. Since then, I think my web development and design skills have improved immensely.
Simple website to display some of my favorite font pairings combined with some fun lorem ipsum variations found on the web.
